Denise Ho

Front-End Developer // Designer

About Myself

Hello, I am Denise from Taiwan. I am an enthusiastic software developer. I like coding as well as learning new technologies. Currently I am working as a front-end developer at a startup company in Taipei, Taiwan. I just got working holiday visa to Ireland, and I plan to go there around the end of June. I hope to join your team as a front-end developer. If you are interested in me, please contact me. Thank you very much.
